captions.text:
Everybody do the Flop!
[thud]

The do the flop guy
liked to dance all the time

But he couldn't do it right no matter how
hard he tried

He had two left feet
from an accident at birth

And every time he danced
he always flopped face first

But then one day
as he jumped in the air

Everybody turned and looked and
they pointed and they stared

He had a bright idea
right before he hit the floor

He shouted "everybody do the flop!"
A new dance craze was born!
Everybody do the Flop!

The do the flop guy
was a viral sensation

Everybody did the flop
across the whole entire nation

He was front page news
with his new dance move

Everyone wanted to join
in his new dance crew

But then one day
things started going wrong

When a flop concert
was interrupted by a bomb

He said "Please, Stop!
But no matter what he tried

There was no going back
for the Do the Flop Guy

The Do the Flop Guy
had to start a new trend

'Cuz the flop might cause
the whole world to end

He had stop people from
flopping on their faces
He tried to invent a new dance sensation
Everybody do the Don't Fall Down!
Everybody do the Stay In Place!
Everybody do the Standing Up!

Everybody do the Don't Fall Down!
[Keep your feet on the ground!]

Everybody do the Stay In Place!
[Please don't break your face!]

Everybody do the Standing Up!
[Don't even put your hands up!]
Everybody don't do the flop!

The Do the Flop Guy
couldn't make them all stop

They didn't like the new moves
as much as the flop

They tuned him out
and they all turned their backs

Yeah they left him behind
and they called him a hack

The Do the Flop Guy
had nothing left to prove

Only one thing left
that he knew how to do

It was in his blood
call it destiny or fate

He shouted "Everybody do the flop!"
And the Earth began to shake
[CHORUS]

Hey, you! "Do The Flop" t-shirts
now available at SharkRobot.com/asdfmovie

If you don't buy one
YOU DON'T WANNA FIND OUT WHAT'LL HAPPEN.
